title: Software Engineer-1
content:
Interested in being part of a team that impacts millions of people? If you’re energized by our vision to make the world a better place and you empathize with our players, then read on!We’re hiring exceptional people to help and grow our game titles— and to dream up new ideas that will reach millions. In this role, you will be working in a fast-paced world with some of the smartest minds in the industry.What is waiting for you?Keeping our tens of millions of happy players in mind;Monitoring and maintaining services for keeping games stableDeveloping creative/exciting features with other hardworking developers, artists, and product managers!Researching, designing, and implementing solutions that will improve servicesThe chance to improve yourself inside Zynga engineering cultureWhat You Need?BS/MS degree in Computer Science or related fieldGood knowledge of Algorithms, Data Structures, and OOP PrinciplesExperience in Web application development using Spring BootExperience with Relational, NoSQL, and in-memory database systemsStrong written and verbal skills in EnglishWho we are?We are a game studio;In Zynga family located in IstanbulResponsible for biggest board and card games in Turkey and The USABelieve in team spirit/collaborationHaving passionate, ambitious, and eager to learn/experience geek matesZynga is an equal opportunity employer. We are proud of our broad community; we do not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, medical condition, disability, or any other class or characteristic protected by applicable law. We welcome job-seekers, players, employees, and partners from all backgrounds. Join us!We will consider all qualified job-seekers with criminal histories in a manner consistent with applicable law.Zynga does not  engage in financial exchanges during the recruitment or onboarding process. We do not conduct job interviews over third-party messaging apps such as Telegram, WhatsApp or others. We will never ask you for your personal or financial information over unofficial chat channels. Our in-house recruitment team only contacts individuals via official company email addresses (i.e., via a zynga.com or naturalmotion.com email domain).
If you believe you have been the victim of a scam, you may wish to contact the authorities. In the United States, you may file a complaint with the FBI. More information is available here: https://www.ic3.gov.

questions.description: By clicking "I Acknowledge", you acknowledge that your personal information will be collected and used by Zynga based on the Privacy Notice for Job Applicants (the “Privacy Notice”), available at https://www.take2games.com/applicantprivacypolicy/. The Privacy Notice provides information about how we use your data and how you can exercise your data rights (such as access, correction, or deletion). If you need more information, please contact the Privacy Contact identified in the Privacy Notice.
